post.body: iPhone if you like to use email and web browser on the go. Touch keyboard takes some time to get used to.
offer for Obama winter hat with a donation of $25 was in my email box today. Paperweights just might be next.
brands are fine with useful info but no ads on Twitter pls
Foreseeing a puppy-cam-viewing addiction. Happy 2-week birthday puppies!
Not such a good idea: fresh pomegranate seeds floating in sparkling wine.
thanks ustream.tv for such an easy setup! very cool.
Sun + rain = could we get another cold front in H-town please?
Why does it feel like New Years Day this morning?
watching Buddy's puppies on live webcam. Way too much fun!
top Google search....wondering what businesses are open on Christmas Day. Is that bad?
Just threw a snowball at Lupe Tortillas!
Wondering if engineers use twitter ;)
Counting the days until February 17, 2009!
Curious to see how the Senator Caroline Kennedy campaign plays out.
Very clever app @itcn Good to know I'm not wasting too much time on twitter :-) http://tweetwasters.com/
Hello and goodnight, moon.
Watching NBCs Greatest Holiday Moments: Bing Crosby & David Bowie singing Little Drummer Boy. Thinking two skinny guys with great voices.
OK, I laughed out loud. Hamster on a piano eating popcorn. http://tinyurl.com/6hdvcw
Houston, we have a light snowfall warning until midnight! News ticker scrolling across TV screen.
I see snowflakes!
